question_text: Select two scenarios where Bluetooth multipoint functionality may fail or become unreliable.
answer_options: Multiple paired devices attempt simultaneous audio playback
Paired device is placed in airplane mode
Too many saved Wi-Fi networks are present
The device switches between cellular towers
correct_answer: Multiple paired devices attempt simultaneous audio playback
Paired device is placed in airplane mode
explanation: Multipoint Bluetooth may not handle simultaneous audio output well, and airplane mode disables Bluetooth unless re-enabled manually.
